name: Space Shooter (itch) (stdd)
description:
Another plane shoter game, but now in SPACE!

Destroy your enemies level up and try to win the game, also you can see your statistic in leader board!

if you want to see a code of this game, here you have a link to gitHub:

https://github.com/NickKRay1234/Grupa12/tree/Latest_version

Good luck!
